statements: SELECT name, employment_status FROM refugee_employment;
SELECT * FROM refugee_employment WHERE employment_status = 'Employed';
SELECT id, name, employment_status, skills FROM refugee_employment ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM refugee_employment WHERE skills LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT name, employment_status FROM refugee_employment WHERE employment_status = 'Unemployed' OR employment_status = 'Underemployed';
SELECT name, employment_status FROM refugee_employment WHERE employment_status='Unemployed';
SELECT * FROM refugee_employment WHERE skills LIKE '%Programming%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM refugee_employment WHERE employment_status='Employed' AND skills='IT' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_employment WHERE employment_status IS NOT NULL AND skills IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT name, skills FROM refugee_employment WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'Z%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM refugee_employment;
SELECT name, employment_status FROM refugee_employment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT job_title, salary FROM job_matching WHERE salary >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM refugee_employment ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, employment_status FROM refugee_employment WHERE skills LIKE '%communication%';
SELECT id, name, employment_status, skills FROM refugee_employment WHERE employment_status = 'unemployed';
SELECT id, name, employment_status FROM refugee_employment WHERE skills LIKE '%communication%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, job_title, required_skills, salary FROM job_matching WHERE salary >= 50000 ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT id, job_title, required_skills, salary FROM job_matching WHERE required_skills LIKE '%programming%' AND salary < 60000;
SELECT id, job_title, salary FROM job_matching WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer' OR job_title = 'Data Analyst' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_employment;
SELECT name, employment_status FROM refugee_employment WHERE employment_status = 'Unemployed';
SELECT company, job_title, salary FROM job_openings ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT id, refugee_id, job_id FROM job_matches WHERE match_score > 4.5;
SELECT company, skills_required FROM job_openings WHERE company LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT * FROM refugee_employment
SELECT name, skills FROM refugee_employment
SELECT job_title, company, salary FROM job_openings WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT * FROM job_matches WHERE match_score >= 4.0 ORDER BY datetime_matched DESC
SELECT id, name, employment_status, skills FROM refugee_employment JOIN job_matches ON refugee_employment.id = job_matches.refugee_id JOIN job_openings ON job_matches.job_id = job_openings.id
SELECT * FROM refugee_profile;
SELECT name, age, employment_status FROM refugee_profile WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM job_opportunities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT title, description, salary FROM job_opportunities WHERE salary > 50000;

SELECT rp.name, jp.title, mc.match_score FROM refugee_profile rp JOIN matched_jobs mj ON rp.id = mj.refugee_id JOIN job_opportunities jp ON mj.job_id = jp.id JOIN skills_catalog sc ON sc.skill_id = mj.skill_id WHERE sc.skill_name = 'Programming';
SELECT name, age, employment_status FROM refugee_profile WHERE age > 25 AND employment_status = 'unemployed';
SELECT title, description, salary, location FROM job_opportunities WHERE salary >= 50000 AND location = 'New York';
SELECT rp.name, jo.title, jo.salary FROM refugee_profile rp INNER JOIN job_opportunities jo ON rp.skills CONTAINS jo.title WHERE rp.age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT mj.match_score, rp.name, jo.title FROM matched_jobs mj INNER JOIN refugee_profile rp ON mj.refugee_id = rp.id INNER JOIN job_opportunities jo ON mj.job_id = jo.id WHERE mj.match_score > 70;
SELECT sc.skill_name, COUNT(*) AS total_jobs FROM skills_catalog sc INNER JOIN job_opportunities jo ON sc.skill_id = jo.id GROUP BY sc.skill_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM refugee_details;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM refugee_details WHERE age > 25;
SELECT job_title, salary FROM job_openings ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT applicant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_applications FROM job_applications GROUP BY applicant_id;
SELECT rd.name, j.job_title, mj.matching_score FROM refugee_details rd JOIN matched_jobs mj ON rd.id = mj.applicant_id JOIN job_openings j ON j.id = mj.job_id WHERE mj.matching_score > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM refugee_details;
SELECT id, name, age, gender, nationality FROM refugee_details WHERE age > 25;
SELECT skill_name, skill_level FROM skills ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_description, salary FROM job_openings WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT applicant_id, job_id, application_date FROM job_applications WHERE status = 'pending';
